de.uzk.hki.da.core

Class IngestGate

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.uzk.hki.da.core.IngestGate

  • public class IngestGate
extends Object
    Should protect the WorkArea from reaching its limits. The WorkArea is the primary space for the ContentBroker to work on. For a first implementation, UnpackAction and ObjectToWorkAreaAction should use it to ask if a package can be moved from lza or staging to WorkArea
    Author:
    Christian Weitz, Thomas Kleinke
